text: Michel Lejeune (30 January 1907 - 27 January 2000) was a French linguist, a specialist in the sound changes of Ancient Greek. He was a member of the Académie des inscriptions et belles-lettres. Category:1907 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Linguists from France Category:École Normale Supérieure alumni Category:Members of the Académie des Inscriptions et Belles- Lettres Category:20th-century linguists
title: Michel Lejeune (linguist)
